long_description:
This mod provides an object-based API for easier creation of appliances, machines, etc. 
Appliances support power by technic electricity, mesecenos, hand. Production can depend on the usage of something, connected water.
name: appliances
short_description: API for create appliances in other mods powered by technic, mesecons or hand.
title: Appliances API
